AE4C898844FB5CDC82A1319D7BA7AB8D: Adds the instigating player as a target for the Speaker to play audio from when activated.
D839D6FC41FFECF518D450AC69E4D959: Plays a sound on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
68258A6B4C3D2AE1A5DCAEA97ECCB0EE: Removes all instigating players as a target for the Speaker to play audio from when activated.
6930087D4C3B4C53AF050DBCC4820FAC: Removes the instigating player as a target for the Speaker to play audio from when activated.
A72931D040AE0DADB87B12A04C7BC911: Stops the active sound on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
651D5A55464CA0975A574BB2D0C7C3CD: Unregister All Players When Receiving From
00DD7A5B4092471E6E4DD986CFB80C96: Used to play one-off sound effects. For looping audio, use the Radio Device.
7AC5D3E94CA257D57E7FA0A62B538B38: Used to play one-off sound effects. For persistent audio, use the Radio Device.
820187974D897E86B0B8B5955192977C: Used to play one-off sound effects. For persistent audio, use the Radio Device.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Stereo Spread.D: A scale at where the steIf greater than 0, we effectively create two speakers, a left and right speaker to play this sound from. This value is the distance between those speakers. The play location is half way between those speakers.reo spread, where 0 is the Attenuation Min Distance
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Stereo: A scale at where the steIf greater than 0, we effectively create two speakers, a left and right speaker to play this sound from. This value is the distance between those speakers. The play location is half way between those speakers.reo spread, where 0 is the Attenuation Min Distance
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Attenuation Fun: Defines how volume should change between the Attenuation Min Distance to Attenutation Falloff Distance.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Attenu: Defines how volume should change between the Attenuation Min Distance to Attenutation Falloff Distance.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Play Location.D: Determines if the audio should be played from the device location or the location of any registered players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Play L: Determines if the audio should be played from the device location or the location of any registered players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Audio.Descripti: Determines the audio to be played when the device is activated.
Determines the audio to be played when the device is activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.EnabledDuringPh: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown). A disabled Audio Player will not respond to requests to Play, and any playing audio will stop when it is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Enable: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-Game includes all phases prior to the Game starting (the waiting for players lobby on Featured Islands and the Game Start Countdown). A disabled Audio Player will not respond to requests to Play, and any playing audio will stop when it is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Mesh.Descriptio: Determines the mesh that can be used to override the default Audio Player mesh.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Mesh.D: Determines the mesh that can be used to override the default Audio Player mesh.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Visible In Game: Determines whether the device will be visible during the game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Visibl: Determines whether the device will be visible during the game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Play On Hit.Des: Determines whether the device will play audio when hit by a player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Play O: Determines whether the device will play audio when hit by a player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Can Be Heard By: Determines who will be able to hear the audio from this device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Can Be: Determines who will be able to hear the audio from this device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Disable.Descrip: Disables the device, preventing it from being activated (i.e. playing audio).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Disabl: Disables the device, preventing it from being activated (i.e. playing audio).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Enable Spatiali: Enables audio panning based on position relative to the listener (which is the camera by default).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Enable: Enables audio panning based on position relative to the listener (which is the camera by default).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.SyncPlayerAudio: Enables the audio to be synchronised across all devices. Recommended for longer sounds such as music or dialogue.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.SyncPl: Enables the audio to be synchronised across all devices. Recommended for longer sounds such as music or dialogue.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Enable.Descript: Enables the device, allowing it to play audio when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Enable: Enables the device, allowing it to play audio when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Enable Volume A: Enables volume changes based on proximity to the listener (which is the camera by default).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Enable: Enables volume changes based on proximity to the listener (which is the camera by default).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Enable Attenuat: If set, show the attenuation visuals.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Enable: If set, show the attenuation visuals.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Restart Audio W: If set, will restart any playing audio when activated. If not set, activations will be ignored if the audio is already playing.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Restar: If set, will restart any playing audio when activated. If not set, activations will be ignored if the audio is already playing.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.PlaybackSpeed.D: Raises or lowers the pitch of the audio by changing the playback speed. 1=no change, 2=twice as fast, 0.5=half speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Playba: Raises or lowers the pitch of the audio by changing the playback speed. 1=no change, 2=twice as fast, 0.5=half speed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Register Player: Registers a player as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Regist: Registers a player as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Unregister All: Removes all registered players as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Unregi: Removes all registered players as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Volume.Descript: Sets the volume for the selected audio. This is a Linear setting so 2 = twice as loud , 0.5 is half as loud as source audio volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Volume: Sets the volume for the selected audio. This is a Linear setting so 2 = twice as loud , 0.5 is half as loud as source audio volume.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Attenuation Min: The range around the device in which the audio will remain at the value set in the Volume user option setting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Attenu: The range around the device in which the audio will remain at the value set in the Volume user option setting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Attenuation Fal: The range from Attenuation Min Distance to Attenutation Falloff Distance over which the sound will go from set volume to silent.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Attenu: The range from Attenuation Min Distance to Attenutation Falloff Distance over which the sound will go from set volume to silent.
The time it takes for the audio to reach full volume in seconds when the audio is triggered to play. 0= immediately.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.FadeIn: The time it takes for the audio to reach full volume in seconds when the audio is triggered to play. 0= immediately.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.FadeOutDuration: The time it takes for the audio to reach zero volume in seconds when the audio is triggered to stop. 0= immediately.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.FadeOu: The time it takes for the audio to reach zero volume in seconds when the audio is triggered to stop. 0= immediately.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.Unregister Play: Unregisters a player as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.Unregi: Unregisters a player as a target for the speaker to play audio from when activated.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.AutoPlay - Game: Will play automatically at the end of each game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.AutoPl: Will play automatically at the end of each game.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.AutoPlay - Roun: Will play automatically at the end of each round.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.AutoPl: Will play automatically at the end of each round.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.AutoPlay - Coun: Will play automatically during the Game Countdown
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.AutoPl: Will play automatically during the Game Countdown
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.AutoPlay - Wait: Will play automatically during the pregame lobby.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.AutoPl: Will play automatically during the pregame lobby.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_C.AutoPlay - Game: Will play automatically while the game is in progress.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_CRD_AudioPlayer_Migrated_C.AutoPl: Will play automatically while the game is in progress.
